programme.title: Women's Pole Vault Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Pole Vault Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 07/08/24. Nina Kennedy (AUS) won Gold with a height of 4.90m. Katie Moon (USA) claimed Silver, and Alysha Newman (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Finals Piste: Men's Sabre Team Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Sabre Team Bronze and Gold Medal Bouts took place on 31/07/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. In the Gold Medal Bout, the Republic of Korea won the Golf over Hungary, who won Silver. In the Bronze Medal Bout, France took the Bronze over Iran.

programme.title: Tuskers Volleyball Club
programme.desc: Team USA Olympic hero Danielle Scott-Arruda travels to London, England to try to turn around the fortunes of a struggling volleyball team.

programme.title: Meet Croatia’s first family of water polo
programme.desc: Yugoslavia was a dominant force in water polo, and the Bukic family from Croatia has been at the heart of it. The father Perica won three Olympic medals. Now his son Luka is carrying on the family legacy by winning silver at Rio 2016.

programme.title: Mat B: Men's Greco-Roman & Freestyle, Women's Freestyle - Day 13 - Evening | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes Men's Greco-Roman 67kg and 87kg Semifinals and Finals and Women's Freestyle 53kg Semifinals and Finals.
In Men's Greco-Roman 67Kg Saeid Esmaeli Leivesi (IRI) won the Gold Medal, Parviz Nasibov (UKR) won the silver, and Luis Alberto Orta Sanchez (CUB)and Hasrat Jafarov (AZE) completed the podium with Bronze.
In Men's Greco-Roman 87Kg Semen Sergeevich Novikov (BUL) won the Gold Medal, Alireza Mohmadipiani (IRI) won the silver, and Turpal Ali Bisultanov (DEN)and Zhan Beleniuk (UKR) completed the podiumwith Bronze.
In Women's Freestyle 53Kg Akari Fijinami (JPN) won the Gold Medal, Lucia Yamileth Yepez Guzman (ECU) won the silver, and Qianyu (CHN) and Hyo Gyong CHOE (PKR) completed the podiumwith Bronze.

programme.title: Rulon | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: At the 2000 Olympic Games, American wrestler Rulon Gardner beat the unbeatable and became an overnight sensation. But what came after the ‘Miracle on the Mat’ was even more unpredictable.

programme.title: SWE-CHN - Men's Team Gold Medal Match | Table Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's Team Gold Medal Match Sweden v China, at South Paris Arena 4, Paris, on 09/08/24. Final score CHN 3:0 SWE.
China won Gold, Sweden won Silver and France won Bronze.

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 8
programme.desc: In this episode: table tennis robot trainers, boxing trackers, regenerative clothing, cycling smart glasses, aerodynamic sails, and football goal control.

programme.title: Gamers Vs: Episode 3
programme.desc: Popular Gamers apply their gaming skills to Olympic sports with the help of world-class athletes and international coaches. Watch them trying the sports of Curling, Archery and Table Tennis.

programme.title: Women's High Jump Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's High Jump Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 04/08/24. Yaroslava Mahuchikh (UKR) won the Gold with a height of 2.00m. Nicola Olyslagers (AUS) won the Silver and Iryna Gerashchenko (UKR) and Eleanor Patterson (AUS) came in joint third.

programme.title: Memory Lane | 72 - A Gathering of Champions
programme.desc: Fifty years after their Olympic victories in Munich, famed gymnast Olga Korbut, Germany’s long jump star Heide Rosendahl, Kenya’s long-distance running hero Kip Keino and Great Britain’s celebrated pentathlete Mary Peters make an emotional return to the scene of their gold medal wins.

programme.title: ITA-USA - Women's Gold Medal Match | Volleyball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Gold Medal Match took place at South Paris Arena 1, Paris, on 11/08/2024. Italy won Gold with a final score ITA 3:0 USA.

programme.title: Brazil’s Jackie Silva (extended)
programme.desc: Olympic gold medallist Jackie Silva won a historic title in Atlanta. Now, the Brazilian legend helps troubled youth shape up through sport.

programme.title: Mat B: Men's & Women's Freestyle - Day 15 - Evening | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes Men's Freestyle 65kg and 97kg Semifinals and Freestyle 74kg and 125kg Finals as well as the Women's Freestyle 76kg Semifinals and Freestyle 62kg Finals.

programme.title: Rulon | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: At the 2000 Olympic Games, American wrestler Rulon Gardner beat the unbeatable and became an overnight sensation. But what came after the ‘Miracle on the Mat’ was even more unpredictable.

programme.title: Women's Trap Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Trap Finals took place on 31/07/2024 at Chateauroux Shooting Centre. Adriana Ruano (GUA) won Gold, Silvana Stanco (ITA) won Silver, and Penny Smith (AUS) won Bronze.

programme.title: Taking Refuge (Full Length Documentary)
programme.desc: Inspired to make the world a better place through sport, three-time Olympic gold medallist Niccolo Campriani leads three refugees on a brave journey to qualify for the next Olympic Games in the Air Rifle event. Using mental and physical skills honed over years as a professional athlete, Campriani coaches and mentors Mahdi, Khaoula and Luna on a journey of learning, rediscovery and finding inner peace through the unifying power of sport. Taking Refuge follows Niccolo and his team of athletes as they set out to achieve their Olympic dream.

programme.title: Olympic rowing champion Sizwe Ndlovu visits refugees in Greece
programme.desc: In Greece, Sizwe Ndlovu plays badminton, wheelchair basketball and judo with the refugees and was touched by the generosity of the Greeks.

programme.title: Can Jackie Silva get this Brazilian volleyball team to defeat their rival?
programme.desc: Brazilian Olympic gold medalist Jackie Silva lends her expertise to a Rio indoor volleyball team as they try to win their first event ever.

programme.title: Meet Croatia’s first family of water polo
programme.desc: Yugoslavia was a dominant force in water polo, and the Bukic family from Croatia has been at the heart of it. The father Perica won three Olympic medals. Now his son Luka is carrying on the family legacy by winning silver at Rio 2016.

programme.title: Samele (ITA) and Elsissy (EGY) - Men's Sabre Individual Bronze Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Individual Sabre Bronze Medal Bout between Luigi Samele (ITA) and Ziad Elsissy (EGY) took place on 27/07/2024 at the Grand Palais Podium Piste. Samele (ITA) took the Bronze with a victory over Elsissy (EGY)

programme.title: Opening Ceremony | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Re-experience an Opening Ceremony for the ages, walking you through the history of the Host nation while celebrating Olympic Values in spectatcular fashion.

programme.title: The Olympic Series: The Olympic spirit : Redefining sport
programme.desc: The Olympic Series Vol.3, Program 4 : The Olympic spirit : Redefining sport.

programme.title: 10m Air Rifle Mixed Team Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 27/07/2024 at the Chateauroux Shooting Range, Paris. CHN claimed the Gold, KOR the Silver and KAZ completed the podium.

programme.title: ‘We’re the Best Team in New York City’ | We Are King
programme.desc: City soccer is very special in New-York City and MLK sits at the top, with 19 titles in 25 years. The team is off to a new season and gunning for its 20th title. Coach Jake and assistant Kamani welcome the team for their first practice and super-pro prospect Carlos Lainez is back from Spain. TThey will soon play the top Ohio State team. After a rough start, the team is taking shape but it’s a 16 match competition before the play-offs begin.

programme.title: ‘The Guy in the Mirror is Usually the One Stopping You’ | We Are King
programme.desc: Carlos Junior, the team captain and best pro prospect has 13 brothers and sisters, 4 are living with him and his dad in the Bronx. A semi-pro club in Spain offered him a contract but he made the promise to Jake and his MLK family to get them that 20th win. Maynor, also from Honduras, is taking care of his disabled mother. After a shaky start to the season, he comes into his own against Upper West Side rival Beacon.

programme.title: Men's Individual Time Trial | Cycling Road | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Men's Individual Time Trial took place at Pont Alexandre III on the 27/07/24. Remco Evenepoel (BEL) won the Gold Medal, Filippo Ganna (ITA) won the Silver Medal, and Wout Van Aert (BEL) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Mat 1: Women's -48kg, Men's -60kg Repechages/Semi-Finals/Finals | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's -48kg and Men's -60kg Finals took place on 27/07/2024 at the Champs-de-Mars Arena. At the Women's -48kg, Natsumi Tsunoda (JPN) claimed the gold, Baasankhuu Bavuudorj (MGL) won silver, and the two bronze medals went to Tara Babulfath (SWE) and Shirine Boukli (FRA). At the Men's -60kg, Yeldos Smetov (KAZ) won the gold, Luka Mkheidze (FRA) took the silver, and the bronze went to Francisco Garrigos (ESP) and Ryuju Nagayama (JPN).

programme.title: How Majlinda Kelmendi’s historic Olympic medal put Kosovo on the map
programme.desc: Majlinda Kelmendi’s gold medal in Rio put Kosovo on top of the podium for the first time soon after being welcomed into the Olympic family.

programme.title: Nikoloz: The judo World Champion from two nations | The Starting Line
programme.desc: When Nikoloz Sherazadishvili’s family moved him from Georgia to Spain at a young age, his father instilled a love of judo in him. He quickly felt at home at the local club of Brunete, in the outskirt of Madrid, where everything started with his first coach Quino Ruiz. As he gears up for his second Olympics, surrounded by his family and friends, he’s competing on the mat for Spain but also holding Georgia and the memory of his father close to his heart.

programme.title: Athletes Under Fire - Episode 1: Yemen & Syria
programme.desc: Yemeni judo Olympian Ali Khousrof, and Syrian artistic gymnastics champion Ahmad Al Sawas, promote the power of sport in cities under siege.

programme.title: ‘You Not Really about it’ | We Are King
programme.desc: MLK high school has been unstoppable this year. They are about to achieve an undefeated season. But Coach Jake is getting increasingly tense. While some players like Charles are doing great both at school and on the team, others like goalkeeper Raymond are struggling to keep their nerves, putting the whole team at risks. Raymond is trying to live up to the dreams and expectations of his father, a talented goalkeeper himself who never made it pro. Soon the team faces a decisive game which will determine the number one seed in the playoffs.

programme.title: ‘This is What We Live For’ | We Are King
programme.desc: MLK finally enters the playoffs. Three more games separate the team from their goal but their starting goalkeeper is now suspended. Assistant coach Kimani, both the kids’ chief on-field instructor and off-field confidant, manages to keep the team in balance. His patience combined with Jake’s drive are a perfect match. Defender Vakaba, who has come to New York City to fulfil his dream, joins the team and becomes an essential part of its success.

programme.title: ‘The Only Game that Matter is the Last One’ | We Are King
programme.desc: Can we tell a King player from another player just by his look?. A storybook season must end in storybook fashion. But as MLK is leading in semi-final, top player Carlos get a yellow card against their long-time rivals Beacon. Jake's obsession is now turning into superstition as he makes a final call that will soon turn the team fortune. Maynor, who had seemed to struggle in front of the goal since the start of the season, is proving to be a decisive striker.

programme.title: Rafaela Silva at age 21
programme.desc: At home with judo star Rafaela Silva when she was 21.

programme.title: Women's Individual Time Trial | Cycling Road | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Women's Individual Time Trial took place at Pont Alexandre III on the 27/07/24. Grace Brown (AUS) won the Gold Medal, Anna Henderson (GBR) won the Silver Medal, and Chloe Dygert (USA) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Italy’s Valentina Vezzali (extended)
programme.desc: Watch the extended version of Legends Live On featuring six-time gold medallist Valentina Vezzali whose domination in fencing earned her the nickname "Cobra."

programme.title: Men's Bronze Medal Match RSA - AUS | Rugby | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Rugby Bronze Medal Match between South Africa and Australia took place on 27/07/2024 at the Stade de France. South Africa took the Bronze with a Final Score of RSA 26:19 AUS.

programme.title: Men's Gold Medal Match FRA - FIJ | Rugby Sevens | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match between France and Fiji took place on 27/07/2024, at the Stade de France. France took the Gold with a Final Score FRA 28:7 FIJ.
